title: SHANY Makeup Artists Must Have Pro Eyeshadow Palette, 96 Color
description: Not satisfied with your Small eyeshadow kit, you want more colors? then you got the right item! did you know that all Shany's collection are made, assembled, cherry picked, and inspected by hand? There are no machine made eye shadows in this collection; each single eye shadow has been put in a palette by hand, as you can see in the pictures. Color rainbow has been the best selling brand in department stores and major beauty salons. Shany's product are beauty leaders in the market, as their pigments quality are always top of the line. This particular eye shadow kit is made after 3 months of research on popular colors for cold and hot weather and for day and night styles. What you see is a complete deluxe makeup kit that every woman must have. We take the most pride in our product's quality since each single eye shadow will be inspected twice, before packaging, and before shipment. The colors are long lasting and will not fade after a couple of hours unlike the other brands out there. Once you applied Shany eye shadow there is no need for reapplying, the color will stay until you wash it off. The variety of colors will allow you to do any kind of look you desire such as cat eyes, smokey eyes, bridal look and so on. Once u have this kit you can simply get rid of any other eye shadow kit that you have because you will get every color that you possibly need in this kit. There is no brush or mirror included in this kit.

title: Soft'n Style Large Butterfly Clamps, 12 Count
description: Large butterfly clamps which is perfect for separating long or short hair and  great for hot rollers.

title: Skin Obsession 30% Glycolic Acid Chemical Peel for home use: treats Acne, Scars, Sun Damage and Fine Lines.
description:
Glycolic Acid has long been a first line product of the finest spas and Dermatology offices for improving the skin.  For those of you who have heard the term "Lunch Time Peel", this is the chemical used for i.Now you can do these peels at home safely and with fantastic results.  Each 1 fl oz (30 ml) bottle of Skin Obsession's 30% Glycolic Acid Peel will yield approximately 8-10 peels done at 3-4 week intervals, a potential savings of  $733.00-$5000.00!.  After peeling your skin will be feel softer, look smoother, with improved texture and tone and reduced hyperpigmentation (sun damage). Under the skin collagen is forming to plump up fine lines and smooth scars.  With a peel of this strength, a full course of peels (8-10 peels) are needed to see optimal results. Glycolic Acid is a naturally occurring chemical belonging to the Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) family.  This important AHA is the smallest of the fruit acids and is able to penetrate the skin, allowing it to effectively dissolve the "glue" that holds dead cells on the surface of the skin. The dead skin cells are what cause a dull, uneven skin tone, and the blocking of pores leading to blackheads and acne.  This dissolving action of the Glycolic Acid allows the dead cells to slough off. Our 30% Glycolic Acid Peel is a mild glycolic acid peel and is suitable for all skin types and both beginning and experienced peelers.   There may be some redness right after the peel, but generally there is not much if any actual peeling (hence the name Lunch Time Peel, you can go right back to work after you have it done).  The 30% is very safe when used as directed, but is a strong, professional strength peel (pH 2) and should be used only as directed.  As with all products, a patch test is recommended to see how your skin reacts to the peel.
By purchasing this product, you assume all risk associated with its use and are responsible for all results either intended or unintended from using this product.
